resources.string:
Help:
1.Take your hand closer to Proximity sensor, ADC value: xx (Reference detected ADC value >= 50).
2.Take your hand away from Proximity sensor, ADC value: xx(Reference undetected ADC value < 50).
3.Set the test result manually.

Help:
1.Take your hand closer to Proximity sensor, ADC value: xx (Reference detected ADC value >= 50).
2.Take your hand away from Proximity sensor, ADC value: xx(Reference undetected ADC value < 50).
3.Set the test result manually.
